project.objective: Sedentary posture at work is very common for office workers throughout the world. This creates a major health risk that may lead to organ damage, muscle degeneration, or back problems. SitSmart - a sensor-equipped seat cushion detects various physiological signals to break the cycle for customers interested in this self-assessment.
project.title: A sensor-equipped seat cushion to support office workers and teach a healthy lifestyle depending on physiological signals gathered unobtrusively.
